title: FS/FT: Carolina Brights Mathewson PRICE REDUCTION - now $2,300
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Carolina Brights Mathewson PRICE REDUCTION - now $2,300
posts.post_content:
Looking to potentially sell the T206 CB Matty I have for $2,300....or a nice trade for another HOFer.  I'm also a HOF RC collector, so if you have something available, please let me know.  Cash/trade would also be considered, but cash is always king!  Thank you all!

Jimi

[quote name="jimivintage" post=1492419]Not really wanting to unload my Carolina Brights Mathewson, but I might be persuaded by a generous offer.  :)  (I know....asking for offers is not popular on Net54, but I'll give it a try.)  I might even exercise the possibility of a cash/trade deal, too.  Anyone want a CB Matty?!

:D

Jimi[/QUOTE]

good luck on the sale but you probably should put a price...

[quote name="1952boyntoncollector" post=1492424]good luck on the sale but you probably should put a price...[/QUOTE]

Yeah, I know.  :D  Like I said, I know it's not something that's popular to do here, but thought I'd see if there's interest.  

Just to throw a link everyone's way though, here's a PSA 1.5 that sold in Mile High a couple months back:

[url]http://milehighcardco.com/1909_11_t206_carolina_brights_christy_mathewson_da-lot40716.aspx[/url]

It sold for $3,000.  I would take less!  :)

Jimi

[quote name="jimivintage" post=1492426]Yeah, I know.  :D  Like I said, I know it's not something that's popular to do here, but thought I'd see if there's interest.  

Just to throw a link everyone's way though, here's a PSA 1.5 that sold in Mile High a couple months back:

[url]http://milehighcardco.com/1909_11_t206_carolina_brights_christy_mathewson_da-lot40716.aspx[/url]

It sold for $3,000.  I would take less!  :)

Jimi[/QUOTE]

I would think you have a price in mind if you know you would take less..might as well just say it....or else I think this is going to be a famous net54 lennox cobb or that green cobb auction that never ended...famous cards that didn't have a price (except the lennox cobb did only after many posts)
noone wants to be a gazumper!

OK....$2,600.  Sorry. I wasn't trying to start anything.  I truly was just throwing this on here on a whim while going through my HOF box thinking, "Boy it would be nice to be able to buy some other items for my HOF RC Collection", but I didn't have the cash.  :(  I didn't think think it through, so my apologies.

Jimi
Now just $2,300.  If not, I'm considering sending off to an auction house.
